name: Your First Week At The Office Is Going To Be Great!
name_original: Your First Week At The Office Is Going To Be Great!
description:
A totally normal week at the office. Experience the American Dream of a true 9AM to 5PM office lifestyle.

Controls: 

Mouse Left Click - Interact

 Mouse Left Drag - Move Objects

KNOWN BUG: Do Not Answer Any Emails At 5:00

Made for "Jame Gam #13"

Theme: Not What It Seems

Special Object: A File

Time: 58 Hours

I understand there may be lots of bugs and the game may completely break. I'm proud of myself for what I was able to make in such little time completely from scratch. 

Credits:

Development: SnowDayEllie

Art: Runa Bunny ( https://www.twitch.tv/runa_bunny )

Spoilers: 

As days go on you realize this office might not be what it seemed.
